data.text: @MikeCrapo @LeaderJohnThune @LeaderJohnThune @johnthune shared your post. With Thune supporting Biden’s open border plan, by enabling & encouraging ILLEGAL ALIENS TO VOTE, I would distance myself from him as much as possible. Unless you too support Biden’s plan of illegals voting, & not passing The SAVE Act

@MikeCrapo @LeaderJohnThune MAKING ELECTIONS FAIR AND STOPPING THE CHEATING AND PROTECTING ELECTION INTEGRITY IS NOT FEDETALIZING THEM! THE CONSTITUTION SAYS YOU MUST BE A CITIZEN TO VOTE WHICH MEANS WE NEED A SYSTEM TO PROVE YOU ARE A CITIZEN. I DON'T CARE IF YOU HATE TRUMP OR NOT DEMOCRAT REPUBLICAN OR https://t.co/ONHKuhZ708
@MikeCrapo @LeaderJohnThune Pass the save act…. Propose term limits for the House and Senate.
